original_text: Jesus took the five loaves of bread and the two fish. Then he looked up towards heaven and he thanked God for the food. He broke the bread into pieces. He gave the pieces of bread to the disciples, and they gave the bread to the crowd.
korean_text: 예수께서 떡 다섯 개와 물고기 두 마리를 가지사 하늘을 우러러 축사하시고 떼어 제자들에게 주어 무리에게 나누어 주게 하시니

sentences.original_text: Jesus took the five loaves of bread
Then he looked up towards heaven
and he thanked God for the food
He broke the bread into pieces
He gave the pieces of bread to the disciples
and they gave the bread to the crowd
